overview: Amy is Ephoxâ€™s VP Finance & Administration and is responsible for all aspects of finance, accounting, audit & tax, human resources and administration. She has over a dozen years of financial leadership experience in venture backed and closely held technology companies companies. Amy spent the last twelve years of her career as the financial leader at GeoSpot (location-based services), BeHere (next generation VOIP conference phones), iWin (casual games), Aftermind, and SeeUthere.com (now StarCite).
